Ctrl + Alt + DELhi: Worsening pollution crisis has soured love story with capital
description: Delhi's worsening air pollution is forcing residents to make difficult life choices, with many relocating to cleaner cities like Bengaluru. The choking smog is impacting health, prompting families to leave and professionals to time work trips away from the city. While some can escape, many are left hoping for government intervention to fix the crisis.

description: "Shami is bowling exceptionally well. He is fit and we saw in the three Ranji Trophy matches, where he's won Bengal on his own," Ganguly said on Monday.  Shami took 15 wickets for Bengal in the first two Ranji Trophy matches this season. He bowled 91 overs in the three matches, going wicketless in the game against Tripura.

title: Rank turner? CAB president Sourav Ganguly drops massive hint at Kolkata pitch
description: "Well, they haven't asked for it yet. So, I won't be able to answer the question. It looks a very good one," Ganguly said regarding any requests for a turning wicket. Eden Gardens has hosted two Ranji Trophy matches this season with slower pitches offering minimal help to fast bowlers.

title: Trade talks: Trump says US close to getting 'fair deal' with India; adds a 'love us again' twist
description: US President Donald Trump anticipates a "very different deal" with India, aiming for fair trade after past "unfair" agreements. Union Minister Piyush Goyal confirmed ongoing "very well" discussions on a Bilateral Trade Agreement, acknowledging sensitive issues requiring more time. Both sides indicate progress, despite persistent trade tariff and Russian oil import differences.

title: Red Fort blast: 7 unanswered questions as human body parts, vehicle debris scatter across 25m
description: A powerful blast outside Red Fort metro station plunged the area into chaos, with eyewitnesses describing deafening noise, flying car parts, and widespread panic.  The explosion shattered windows and left debris scattered, causing hundreds to flee. Amidst the destruction, brave individuals rushed to aid the injured, while many searched frantically for loved ones.

title: ‘Don’t have notifications’: JPMorgan chief ignores most texts; keeps phone off at work

Dimon also advocates for US schools to evolve, integrating crucial skills like coding and cybersecurity to prepare students for the modern workforce.

Two others conducted reconnaissance in Kashmir post-Pahalgam attack, identifying potential targets for future strikes. Investigations reveal online radicalization and drone-delivered arms.

Red Fort blast: Explosion that killed 8 occurred in Hyundai i20 car - what we know so far
description: A devastating blast ripped through a Hyundai i20 near Delhi's Red Fort Metro Station, claiming at least eight lives and injuring 24. Authorities have launched a high-alert across multiple states, with the NIA and NSG investigating the explosion. Prime Minister Modi and home minister Shah are actively monitoring the situation and offering support.

title: Texas teen who crashed car killing 6 Indians in 2023 sentenced to 65 years in prison
description: A Texas teenager, 19-year-old Luke Garrett Resecker, has received a 65-year prison sentence for a fatal 2023 crash. Driving under the influence of THC, Resecker caused a head-on collision that claimed the lives of six Indian-origin individuals. The sole survivor, Lokesh, who lost his wife, in-laws, two children and cousin, was left paralyzed.

title: New Aadhaar app launched: Complete guide on features and how to setup the new Aadhar app
description: India's UIDAI has introduced a new Aadhaar app for smartphones. This free app allows citizens to securely carry their digital Aadhaar card, eliminating the need for physical copies. Features include facial recognition, biometric locks, and QR code sharing. Families can manage up to five profiles on one device. The app complements the existing mAadhaar app, which handles document downloads and card orders. This digital solution offers enhanced privacy and convenience for everyday identity verification.

title: Secret AI deal: Apple seeks to keep its billion-dollar pact with Google under wraps; here’s why
description: Apple is reportedly paying Google around $1 billion annually to integrate Google's powerful Gemini AI model into a revamped Siri, a collaboration Apple intends to keep private. This move, codenamed "AFM v10" internally, aims to enhance Siri's capabilities while Apple simultaneously develops its own in-house AI models.

title: Michael Willis Heard death: How TikTok star Yes King tragically died
description: TikTok sensation Michael Willis Heard, known as 'Yes King,' has passed away. His daughter confirmed the news, remembering him for his uplifting videos promoting self-love and confidence. The Elyria, Ohio native, who also served as a life coach and pastor-like figure, inspired millions with his positive energy. His sudden departure has deeply saddened his global fanbase.

title: Noah Gray earns NFL Salute to Service nod amid Travis Kelce successor buzz
description: Kansas City Chiefs are preparing for life after Travis Kelce, with tight end Noah Gray emerging as a respected leader, recognized for his military support.  While Gray shines off-field, the team also eyes potential future talent like Oregon's Kenyon Sadiq in the upcoming NFL Draft. Gray's dedication is already shaping the Chiefs' next era.

title: Klay Thompson apologises to Megan Thee Stallion after airport mishap
description: Dallas Mavericks star Klay Thompson went viral for his heartfelt apology and remorse after arriving late to pick up girlfriend Megan Thee Stallion from the airport. He presented her with flowers, expressing genuine regret, which fans found "adorably human." The couple's authentic connection continues to charm audiences as they both thrive in their careers.
